local_intent: Align to the grape and execute the grasp using the precomputed pose, then verify stability.
assumptions: Grasp pose 'grasp_grape' was computed earlier and is available
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase of the global BT: checks grape visibility, ensures grasp key exists, aligns, performs Pick (with retry), and verifies grasp stability. Parameters match global choices (tolerance=0.005, timeout_ms=1200).
